plot: George, working in a hat shop, gets tricky with the customers. Then Gracie comes in and drives him batty.
title: Your Hat
plot_es: George, working in a hat shop, gets tricky with the customers. Then Gracie comes in and drives him batty.
plot_en: George, working in a hat shop, gets tricky with the customers. Then Gracie comes in and drives him batty.
